name: Resume
body:
# Lisa Hackenberger  
Contact Email: [lisa@weblaws.org](mailto:lisa@weblaws.org)  
Website: [https://github.com/risachi](https://github.com/risachi)  
  
## Summary  
A tinkerer at heart, I'm an accountant looking to switch to a career in tech. This year I learned to make apps using vanilla JavaScript (and jQuery) at Code Fellows, and am currently enrolled in Bloc.io learning Objective-C and Swift. I made my first webpage when I was 13 years old, and have since dabbled with Ruby, Arduino, and Alexa skills.  
   
## Work  
### Staff Accountant, [Wild Salmon Center](http://wildsalmoncenter.org)  
2015-09 - current  
I recently suggested a move to GitHub for the purposes of version control when I learned there was no back-up of our website; as of April 2016, we have a new GitHub repository for the site I perform all Accounts Payable tasks as well as act as an impromptu technology advisor.  

### AR/AP Specialist, [HemCon Medical Technologies](http://www.hemcon.com/)  
2015-05 - 2015-08  
Receive and post payments, manage aging receivables, make collection calls, create and receive POs  

### Accounting Assistant, [Grady Britton](http://gradybritton.com/)  
2014-03 - 2015-04  
Invoice, reconcile cash on account, accounts receivable and payable tasks, make collections calls  
  
## Volunteer  

### Volunteer, [Dove Lewis](http://www.dovelewis.org/community-services/blood-bank/)  
2014-01 - ongoing  
I bring my dog in to donate blood, which is sent to veterinary clinics nation-wide.  
  
### Dog Washer/Dryer, [Dove Lewis](http://www.dovelewis.org/dogtoberfest/)  
2014-09, 2015-09  
I wash and towel-dry dogs each year in the annual Dogtoberfest event to benefit Dove Lewis, a 24-hour emergency veterinary clinic.  

### Volunteer Youth Mentor, Portland State University  
2014-03 - 2014-05  
I visited Donald E Long Juvenile Detention Home weekly to meet with troubled youth.  
  
## Education  
### Bloc.io in iOS Development  
2016-02 - current  
* iOS Foundation - 160 hours  

### Code Fellows in HTML, CSS, JS (jQuery)  
2015-09 - 2016-02  
* Code 201 - HTML, CSS, vanilla JS  
* Code 301 - jQuery, deploying to Heroku, routing  

### Portland State University - BA - Social Sciences in Sociology and Psychology  
2008-09 - 2013-03  
  
## Awards  
Entry-Level Accounting Certificate from Portland Community College on 2014-01  
Japanese Language Proficiency Test Level 3 from Japan Foundation on 2007  
  
## Skills  
* Junior in iOS Development (Swift, Objective-C)  
* Junior+ in Web Development (HTML, CSS, Javascript)  

## Languages  
* B1 in German  
* A2 in Japanese  
  
## Interests  
* Development (iOS, Web Development, Ruby on Rails, R, UX)  
* Science and Technology (Data Science, STEM)  
* Language and Culture
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
